name: Dag Blasted
description:
2 - 4 player local multiplayer bounty hunter shoot' n loot game

Check out the post-jam builds to play the Saloon stage, fight computer opponents, and enjoy other nice improvements.

HOW TO PLAY:

- Aim at players by pressing their matching color button on the Xbox 360 controller.

- Grab their loot when they die.

- First player to $1000 is the winner. 

- Use Dash (L-trigger) to move safely from cover to cover.\

- Press 1/2/3/4 in the Character Select screen add computer-controlled opponents.

CREDITS: 

DOSEONE (@doseonetweets) - Music + Sound + Design + Creative Juices

Damon Chandler (@whirred_up) - Code + Design + salty seaweed snacks

Saam Pahlavan (@saampahlavan) - Character Art + Design + Swag

Ted Anderson - Environment Art + Agility

Created for the Space Cowboy Game Jam
